task.title: Program Goals
task.shortdesc: Goals are created for each Program Term. They are used to gauge whether the participant meets the program's standards or are maintaining those standards. They may or may not be displayed to the participant so that they can track their progress and be directed to step through the program process.

taskbody.context:
Goals are automatically created when a new Program Term is created. A goal is created for each active requirement that corresponds to the specific term checked. The Program and associated requirements are active and the Program Profile does not have an active Program Term. The attributes of each Goal are inherited from the corresponding requirement.
The Goal inherits its attributes from the corresponding requirement.
